Flow.description: Auto Create Contract when Opp is Closed Won

value.stringValue: NOT( AND( CONTAINS([Opportunity].Name ,"Mandate"), CONTAINS([Opportunity].Region__c ,"NABG"), CONTAINS(TEXT([Opportunity].Opportunity_Classification__c) ,"CATM - FI") ))&& ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName ,'Closed/Booked' ) && ISCHANGED([Opportunity].StageName)

formulas.name: formula_myRule_5
formulas.expression: NOT( AND( CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Name} ,"Mandate"), CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Region__c} ,"NABG"), CONTAINS(TEXT({!myVariable_current.Opportunity_Classification__c}) ,"CATM - FI") ))&& ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.StageName} ,'Closed/Booked' ) && ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.StageName})

value.stringValue: NOT( AND( CONTAINS([Opportunity].Name ,"Mandate"), CONTAINS([Opportunity].Region__c ,"NABG"), CONTAINS(TEXT([Opportunity].Opportunity_Classification__c) ,"CATM - FI") ))&& ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName ,'Closed/Booked' )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_7
formulas.expression: NOT( AND( CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Name} ,"Mandate"), CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Region__c} ,"NABG"), CONTAINS(TEXT({!myVariable_current.Opportunity_Classification__c}) ,"CATM - FI") ))&& ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.StageName} ,'Closed/Booked' )

Flow.label: CATM Auto Create Contract
